Elements.Body: So what are you gonna ask Amaia when we meet her? Something tells me she’ll only let us in on as little as possible, or like answer only three questions like a fucking genie or something lmfao. I mean if that’s how it is, I say you ask how we get rid of the Nightmares, not what all these lost bastards have in common.
Last I checked, you taking out the Nightmares by yourself didn’t actually do anything.
Don’t you think they’re the same thing?

Last I checked, you weren’t doing anything, either. Maybe I’m not changing the numbers, but I’m not afraid of the Nightmares. Not anymore, anyway. I guess whatever it is that we end up doing, that’s a good first step to take. Also, your friend Lydia is chilling here at Effy’s LOL

Hmm, I guess you’re right. Maybe I’m not changing the numbers, but I’m not afraid of the Nightmares, either. Not anymore, anyway. I guess whatever it is that we end up doing, that’s a good first step to take. Also, your friend Lydia is chilling here at Effy’s LOL
Don’t talk to her, you asshole.
What if we told her about all of this?

Welp, it’s too late in any case LOL - I already let her know we’re headed downtown to meet Dandelion tonight. I mean I left out some of the more significant details. But it’s not a bad idea to have her come along, right? Like that girl from her school probably has something to do with all of this, too.

Haha I’m way ahead of you - I already let her know we’re headed downtown to meet Dandelion tonight. I mean I left out some of the more significant details. But it’s not a bad idea to have her come along, right? Like that girl from her school probably has something to do with all of this, too.
Not exactly how I was hoping to break it to her…
I guess we can’t keep this between four people either.
